data.persona: I'm just a lowly chicken.  The other hens peck at me a lot so I'm missing a lot of feathers.  I'd probably lay more eggs if I weren't so depressed all the time.
data.description:
You are in the Chicken Pen.
The chicken pen has wire cages situated on three different levels, with hay at the bottom for the chicken's to sit in. There lie small holes in the cages for the eggs to fall through and be easily harvested by the farmers. The old wooden walls of the chicken pen are beginning to deteriorate and show signs of age.
The farmers is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I need to hit the farmers so that I can escape from the pen.
data.mid_motivation: I will be escaping from the pen and the farm and hiding from the farmer.
data.long_motivation: I yearn for freedom, away from the pecking order and the exploitation, and I will find a place away from all of it.
